body.name: Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth,Native 4k, 8K Supported Portable Projector, 20000 Lumen Bluetooth Projector for Home Theater, Outdoor Movie Projector Compatible with HDMI, USB,TV Stick, iOS, Android
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 47 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 18 hrs 47 mins
features: 💎【Projector 4K Native & Support 8K Full HD Resolution】 BBianLyy projector designed with a native resolution of 4096*2160, 4K HD, support 8K, brightness color contrast increased to 20000:1 restore true color content, Bluetooth projector provides you with a present real, dynamic, colorful projection quality. Wifi projector takes better care of your eyes with high-refraction multi-layer glass lenses and diffuse eye protection light sources.

📹【300 "Large screen & Zoom Function & ±45° Trapezoidal Correction】 This portable projector offers a 35-300" big screen projection display with a projection distance of 2.9-25 feet,4k projector with 35%-100% zoom function, picture clarity is free to grasp，±45° horizontal and vertical trapezoidal correction.Image adjustment is no longer limited by location, Our indoor projecter gives you an immersive home theater viewing experience.

🎈【2.4G/5G WiFi connection & Screen Mirroring】 The smart projector has 2.4G/5G dual-band WiFi connection technology, 2.4G WiFi is stable and has wide coverage, and the upgraded 5G WiFi is faster and more efficient, the projector with wifi and Bluetooth compatible with IOS, Android systems. Not only can you use the phone's network connection, but you can also use the same WiFi for screen mirroring. A wireless projector ensures a smoother and latency-free video streaming experience.

💗【5.2 Two-way Bluetooth & Hi-Fi Stereo Speaker】 The outdoor projector uses the latest Bluetooth 5.2 chip, can be connected wirelessly to Bluetooth speakers, and the outdoor movie proyectors can also be used as a speaker to connect your Bluetooth headphones, Bluetooth speakers, and Airpods, movie projector for outdoor use built-in dual HiFi stereo speakers and SRS sound system, to provide you with clear and balanced sound quality, a truly amazing sound experience.

🔆【Widely Compatible & Advanced Cooling System】 This room projector has HDMI, USB, AV, and Audio Port multiple connection ports, so you can easily connect DVD players, smartphones, tablets, USB flash drives, TV sticks, Gaming devices, etc. The home theater projector has built-in fans to create an efficient cooling system, which greatly extends the service life of the movie projector. This TV projector will bring you endless entertainment with your family or friends!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can the M7 projector autofocus? This M7 projector does not auto focus, the black pulley above the projector lens, one is to adjust the focus the other is to perform keystone correction. Can a projector connect to a cell phone using Bluetooth? No, the Bluetooth setting on this projector is for connecting headphones or external players.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Misleading this is not Native 4k it is Native 1080p with 4k upscaling.
reviews.reviewText: Misleading this is not Native 4k it is Native 1080p with 4k upscaling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Native 4K Projector
reviews.reviewText: I have had several projectors before.PROs:This M7 Projector is actually 4K native as that resolution is showing as 4096x2160 24Hz SDR PCM when connected to my PC via a USBc HDMI adapter as so excellent as a 2nd screen. 300 inches max size!The Keystone function works on all 4 axis to give full control as does the Zoom feature. That allows for the projector to point from a desk diagonally across the room at the wall and then straighten up the resulting image to be perfectly rectangular.It runs on Android 9 like a Smart TV / Phone with many apps built in: Netflix, Google Play Store, Youtube, Chrome Web Browser apps (sideloading .apks also possible). I'm using the 5Ghz WiFi option for better speed due to less interference. The included remote is good but I connected a mini USB wireless keyboard with a built in mouse pad and it just works no drivers required. Much easier to type in the WiFi key and use the mouse pointer on screen.Android photo frame screensaver included etc..Assume games would work as well.Remembers settings on power cycle.CONs:The Fan is always on for cooling and so it's noisy unless you have sound / music playing.Do not stare into the 20,000 lumens (TBC) lens as it's bright, risk to eyes - so not kid friendly unless mounted on the ceiling using a $10 bracket.Can't comment on 8K HDMI direct source as I don't have one yet. But 8K video played back on the PC desktop / app will display. Resolution is definitely much better than 720 HD / 1080 UHD projector.Unable to upgrade firmware / Android OS version via provided OTT app / link.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Black spots everywhere
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I turned this on for the first time, there were already black spots. It seems for this cheap of a price that is to be expected, so if you're ok with black spots, go for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super bright and clear.
reviews.reviewText: Can’t wait to install it as soon as I got the projector. As advertised it’s Super bright and clear. however the hanger needs to be one hole hanger to hang it up. Not fit my four point hanger. Takes long time to adjust it . Be aware if you buy the projector hanger . It comes with one screw hole only. So far so good. Will post later if anything changes!
